title: 3: OBITCH Find a different hole...
description:
In this week’s episode the gruesome twosome discuss body farms, moirologists a.k.a. professional mourners, an obituary straight out of Springfield, and so much more! 
Follow OBITCHUARY on instagram: @obitchuarypod 
Send us an email: obitpod@gmail.com

Sources: 
https://www.khq.com/news/cops-inmate-had-condom-stuffed-with-30-items-in-self/article_06f0dc35-d70f-5561-a6b7-192252b23b5b.html
https://www.dallasnews.com/news/texas/2016/09/22/texas-man-s-obit-he-had-a-passion-for-old-cars-scotch-his-construction-company-scotch-travel-and-oh-yeah-scotch/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FDU0X9VVQn4 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lqRo23h01qQ
https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/understanding-grief/201802/professional-mourners-ancient-tradition
https://www.cracked.com/personal-experiences-1994-i-am-professional-mourner-6-realities-my-job.html
https://www.joincake.com/blog/professional-mourners/
https://gawker.com/5974307/florida-woman-who-caught-husband-cheating-takes-dump-on-the-floor-asks-cops-what-was-i-supposed-to-do
